sentences.sentence: Wheeler said the superorganism of the hive "emerges" from the mass of ordinary insect organisms.
sentences.translation: 惠勒说，蜂巢的超级有机体，是从许多普通昆虫有机体中“涌现”出来的。

sentences.sentence: The new report "couldn't come at a better time", says Gerald Wheeler, executive director of the National Science Teachers Association in Arlington.
sentences.translation: 位于阿灵顿的美国国家科学教师协会执行理事杰拉尔德·惠勒表示，这份新报告“来得正是时候”。

sentences.sentence: The truck was an 18-wheeler with a white tractor.
sentences.translation: 这辆卡车有18轮，还有一个白色牵引车头。
